      • selectionChanged

        public void selectionChanged(java.lang.String range,
                             java.lang.String text,
                             java.lang.String handleBounds,
                             boolean isReallyChanged)
        Description copied from interface: TextSelectionControlListener
        Tells the listener to show the context menu for the given range and selected text. The bounds parameter contains a json string representing the selection bounds in the form { 'left': leftPoint, 'top': topPoint, 'right': rightPoint, 'bottom': bottomPoint }
        Specified by:
        selectionChanged in interface TextSelectionControlListener
